name: Grid
overview: Have you always had extraordinary games deep in your heart? Would you dream of a game in the style of a professional sprite editor? Then "Grid" is just right for you, because it combines the properties of a useful utility with those of a tough puzzle game! The aim is to bring a jumbled pattern (left) back to normal. The set time limit proves to be particularly sweaty and usually provokes extremely hectic reactions towards the end! So select a stone as quickly as possible using the joystick button and move it in the desired direction! Published in Magic Disk 64 1992/07.
